sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均可表示"地球"之意。
means: earth ： 指表面有陆地和水，人类所居住行星的名字。有时与"天"相对，泛指"地"。
world ： 通常相当于earth与globe，现多用指地球，地球上的世界，社会和人。
globe ： 指我们生活的地球，但强调其实体和圆形。

word_mean: 用球体表示地球特征的缩小模型。

sentence.Network_en: The overhead light was covered now with a white globe.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在，顶灯已装上了一个白色球状罩子。

sentence.Network_en: Martin, 78, died yesterday. Tributes poured in from around the globe.
sentence.Network_cn: 马丁于昨天去世，享年78岁。世界各地的人们纷纷致以哀悼。

sentence.Network_en: America's media companies bestride the globe.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国的传媒公司称雄寰球。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'spherical object'): from Old French, or from Latin globus

encyclopedia.content: globe（地球乐团），日本著名乐队之一，是1995年小室哲哉（Tetsuya Komuro）自己组的乐队，小室负责制作、乐器部分（电子为主）和一部分rap，成员还有他的现任夫人主音山田圭子(Keiko)，和只唱rap的马克 朋沙(MARC PANTHER，日文名酒井龙一），现在乐队虽然活动不太多，不过有添了个新丁－元XJAPAN的YOSHIKI。globe乐队歌曲中，电子舞曲的成...

entry.tran: 地球，世界（用于强调其广大或某事在许多地区发生）
entry.def: You can refer to the world as the globe when you are emphasizing how big it is or that something happens in many different parts of it.

example.ex: ...bottles of beer from every corner of the globe...
example.tran: 来自世界各个角落的一瓶瓶啤酒

example.ex: 70% of our globe's  surface is water.
example.tran: 地球表面70%的地方覆盖着水。

entry.def: A globe is a ball-shaped object with a map of the world on it. It is usually fixed on a stand.

example.ex: Three large globes stand on the floor.
example.tran: 3个巨大的地球仪立在地板上。

entry.def: Any ball-shaped object can be referred to as a globe .

example.ex: The overhead light was covered now with a white globe.
example.tran: 现在，顶灯已装上了一个白色球状罩子。

means.word_mean: 1. the 3rd planet from the sun; the planet on which we live;
2. an object with a spherical shape;
3. a sphere on which a map (especially of the earth) is represented

auth_sentence.content: Yes. Has the globe been completely bereft of ice?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yes. Has the globe been completely bereft of ice?

sentences.en: There is plenty of water on the face of the globe.
We're planning to travel round the globe.
sentences.cn: 我们正计划做一次环球旅行。

sentences.en: The sun is an immense globe.
sentences.cn: 太阳是一个巨大的球体。

sentences.en: The silvery globe of the moon hung in the sky.
sentences.cn: 银盘似的月亮悬挂在空中。

sentences.en: We use a globe in our geography class.
sentences.cn: 我们在地理课上使用地球仪。
